verbs.description: SINGAPORE -- [ARGM-TMP: When] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [V: sits] down [ARG2: with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-TMP: for the first time] , they will be alone -- save for a pair of interpreters .
SINGAPORE -- When President Donald Trump sits down with North Korean dictator Kim Jong Un for the first time , they [V: will] be alone -- save for a pair of interpreters .
